availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jacob H. Walter (West Deer, Pennsylvania, merchant and prothonotary)

body.p: West Deer, Pennsylvania, merchant and prothonotary. Pennsylvania native. Married to Lillian A. Walters. Father of Maria L. Walters and Lincoln Walters. Merchant in West Deer, Pennsylvania, in 1860. Prothonotary of the Allegheny County Court of Common Pleas in 1860 and 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Pennsylvania, Allegheny County, West Deer, p. 41.; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Pennsylvania, Allegheny County, Pittsburgh, Ward 8, p. 106.
